hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "The five prayers, and Al-Jumuah (the Friday prayer) to Al-Jumuah are atonement for what is between them, as long as the major sins have not been committed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الصَّلَوَاتِ الْخَمْسِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About The Virtue Of The Five Prayers
